dhp179:1: He whose victory may not be undone,
dhp179:2: a victory unrivaled in all the world,
dhp179:3: by what track would you trace that Buddha,
dhp179:4: who leaves not a track in all his infinite range.
dhp180:1: For them there is no craving—
dhp180:2: the weaver, the clinger—to lead them anywhere.
